nodes.text: Broth was a type of food Maz Kanata had at her campsite on the planet Takodana. It was used as an ingredient in Purlah soup, a type of soup made by Loonoo on the moon of Nar Shaddaa whose broth was edible to rib-cats. During the Rebel Alliance's time on Hoth, Hendri Underholt left a bowl of broth to sit too long, resulting in an ice shell being formed. Bone broth was a type of broth made on Sorgan.
